tool_description: Text-to-speech service Opens up new horizons for creativity and content creation.
name: Text To Speech AI
title: Text To Speech AI

api_list.name: Synthesize
api_list.description: Synthesize text into voice, get a link to download audio.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of characters is 100

required_parameters.name: voice_id
required_parameters.description: To get the voice_id, use the Get All Voices request, you can save this list so that you don't waste requests on it, but don't forget to update it periodically

api_list.name: Get All Voices
api_list.description: Get the entire list of available votes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-ai2.p.rapidapi.com/voice/get_voices/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-ai2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-ai2.p.rapidapi.com/voice/get_voices/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-ai2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
